Parameter.Name: Description
Parameter.Description: Use this field to describe this particle.

Parameter.Name: QualityLevel
Parameter.Description: The minimum quality level where this effect is displayed. Set to higher values to make the effect (and its children) appear only with quality settings tuned up.

Parameter.Name: Texture
Parameter.Description: The texture used for this particle effect.

Parameter.Name: TextureAnchorX
Parameter.Description: The anchor X position for this texture.

Parameter.Name: TextureAnchorY
Parameter.Description: The anchor Y position for this texture.

Parameter.Name: TextureCellsX
Parameter.Description: The number of animation cells in this texture. If > 1, the texture will be split into a number of cells and be animated over time.

Parameter.Name: TextureCellsY
Parameter.Description: The number of animation cells in this texture. If > 1, the texture will be split into a number of cells and be animated over time.

Parameter.Name: TextureFrameStart
Parameter.Description:
Specify which frame to start on.
0=first frame
1=last frame.
Final absolute value is capped between 0 and 1.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: TextureFrameTimeline
Parameter.Description:
Specify which frame to show over time.
0 = first frame
1 = last frame
>1 loops.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterLife
Parameter.Description: The duration of this particle system, in seconds. If zeroed, this emitter is disabled.

Parameter.Name: EmitterLoop
Parameter.Description: How emitters are handled after their life time has expired: Loop: The emitter life resets after reaching the maximum. Infinite:The emitter goes on forever. The life setting only applies to graphs using the emitter life as parameter. Once: The emitter is destroyed after playing once.

Parameter.Name: EmitterSpawnDelay
Parameter.Description: How long time should pass before this emitter starts working.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: EmitterSpawnRate
Parameter.Description: How many particles are spawned per second.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterCount
Parameter.Description: The maximum number of particles to spawn. If zero, this restriction is removed.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: EmitterDirection
Parameter.Description: Direction of this emitter, in degrees.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterRange
Parameter.Description: The range of the spread for this emitter, in degrees.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterOffsetX
Parameter.Description: Positional offset from the span location, in X direction.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterOffsetY
Parameter.Description: Positional offset from the span location, in Y direction.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterInitialSpeed
Parameter.Description: Initial speed value.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterInitialRotation
Parameter.Description: Initial rotation value.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterInitialRotationSpeed
Parameter.Description: Initial rotational speed.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: EmitterInitialScale
Parameter.Description: Initial scale.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleLife
Parameter.Description: How long a particle will last, in seconds. If zeroed, particles are not created.

Parameter.Name: Random
Parameter.Description: Amount of randomization for this parameter.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleInfinite
Parameter.Description: If true, particles do not die after exceeding their life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleOrientToVelocity
Parameter.Description: If true, this particle will rotate in the direction it is moving. This will override all other rotational settings.

Parameter.Name: ParticleRelativeToParent
Parameter.Description: If true, this particle's position will be set relative to the parent, meaning that particles will follow if the emitter moves.

Parameter.Name: ParticleColor
Parameter.Description: The particle's color over time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleGravityScale
Parameter.Description: How much the particle should be affected by gravitational acceleration.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleAccelerationX
Parameter.Description: How much the particle should accelerate in world X coordinates.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleAccelerationY
Parameter.Description: How much the particle should accelerate in world Y coordinates.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleAccelerationLocalX
Parameter.Description: How much the particle should accelerate in local X coordinates based on rotation.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleAccelerationLocalY
Parameter.Description: How much the particle should accelerate in local Y coordinates based on rotation.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleAccelerationAngular
Parameter.Description: How much the particle should accelerate angular coordinates.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleAirResistance
Parameter.Description: How much the particle is affected by air resistance.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleTurn
Parameter.Description: Rotation applied to the particle's velocity vector.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleScale
Parameter.Description: Uniform particle scale over time.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleScaleX
Parameter.Description: X scale over time.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleScaleY
Parameter.Description: Y scale over time.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleTurbulenceStrength
Parameter.Description: Controls how much the turbulence affects the particle's velocity.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleTurbulenceScale
Parameter.Description: The scale of the turbulence "bubbles".

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: ParticleTurbulenceSpeed
Parameter.Description: Turbulence time scale.

Parameter.Name: GraphEmitter
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the emitter life time.

Parameter.Name: GraphParticle
Parameter.Description: How this parameter is affected over the particle life time.

Parameter.Name: SegmentCount
Parameter.Description: Total number of segments of the system, they are spread out evenly and centered.

Parameter.Name: SegmentCenter
Parameter.Description: Center of segment spread.

Parameter.Name: SegmentRange
Parameter.Description: Angular +- range from center, in degrees.

Parameter.Name: SegmentSpawnType
Parameter.Description: All: One particle is spawned in every segment and the different particles get their own random values. Clone All: Particles in different segments gets the same values. Sequential: One particle is spawned in one of the segments, in sequence. Random Segment: One particle is spawned in a random segment.

Parameter.Name: SegmentKeepRotation
Parameter.Description: If true, particles will keep their rotation no matter what segment they come from.

Parameter.Name: Mirror
Parameter.Description: Reflect all segments and create a mirror image based on Mirror Center.

Parameter.Name: MirrorCenter
Parameter.Description: Angular mirror center, in degrees from up direction.\n0=Mirror X, 90=Mirror Y

Parameter.Name: SortMode
Parameter.Description: How particles will be sorted before being drawn.

Parameter.Name: BlendMode
Parameter.Description: Which blending mode to use when rendering this effect.
